meanings.definition: A type of fabric or cloth.
meanings.sent1: The tailor used gombroon to create a beautiful dress.
meanings.sent2: The curtains were made of a soft gombroon material.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the gombroon fabric, unraveling it.
meanings.sent4: Her love for sewing was as strong as the gombroon threads holding the dress together.
meanings.sent5: The gombroon cloth shimmered in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A type of color or shade.
meanings.sent1: She painted her room in a calming gombroon hue.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed blue and red to create a unique gombroon shade.
meanings.sent3: The sky turned a beautiful gombroon color as the sun set.
meanings.sent4: His cheeks flushed a deep gombroon when he was embarrassed.
meanings.sent5: The gombroon color of the leaves in autumn was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A type of object or item.
meanings.sent1: The antique shop displayed a rare gombroon vase.
meanings.sent2: She treasured the gombroon necklace her grandmother gave her.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a gombroon rabbit out of his hat to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: His collection of gombroon coins was the envy of all collectors.
meanings.sent5: The gombroon statue stood tall in the museum, attracting many visitors.
